original_text: For only Og king of Bashan remained of the remnant of giants; behold his bedstead was a bedstead of iron; is it not in Rabbath of the children of Ammon? nine cubits was the length thereof, and four cubits the breadth of it, after the cubit of a man.
korean_text: (르바임 족속의 남은 자는 바산 왕 옥뿐이었으며 그의 침상은 철 침상이라 아직도 암몬 족속의 랍바에 있지 아니하냐 그것을 사람의 보통 규빗으로 재면 그 길이가 아홉 규빗이요 너비가 네 규빗이니라)

sentences.original_text: For only Og king of Bashan remained
behold his bedstead was a bedstead of iron;
is it not in Rabbath of the children of Ammon?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 암몬 자손의 랍바에 있지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: nine cubits was the length thereof,
and four cubits the breadth of it,
after the cubit of a man.
